# vDSP_zcspecD

**Function**

Computes the cross-spectrum of two complex double-precision vectors.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_zcspecD(const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __A, const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __B, const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __C, vDSP_Length __N);
```

## Discussion

This function is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_zcspec], except for the types of vectors `A`, `B`, and `C`.

## Vector-to-Vector Spectra Computation

- **vDSP_zcspec**: Computes the cross-spectrum of two complex single-precision vectors.
